title: Simple, Efficient & Collaborative
text: Taskify is designed for ease of use, letting you manage tasks and projects effortlessly without needing to adjust complex settings.

section.title: Why Taskify?
section.content: Taskify combines task tracking, project organization, and team collaboration in a single, streamlined platform, boosting productivity for teams and individuals alike.

section.title: Why JSON Data Structure?
section.content: With JSON-based data storage, Taskify allows you to manage tasks, comments, and project details quickly and flexibly, without requiring technical knowledge.
